name: Radiant Devotion
description:
Radiant Devotion is a Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance fangame centered on Ike/Soren during the day of devotion festival.

The story was originally based on an april fools mockup i made.  

  • The game is divided in two routes (Ike and Soren's)
  • find good gifts for your boyfriend
  • there is a total of 4 endings (2 per route; 3 good ones and a bad one)
  • contains Ikesoren and implied Reybarn

the game play should probably take around half an hour.

It was made in 3 weeks. this is my first time trying RPGMaker so it's very short and simple but please enjoy!!
